name: Mac Twist to SAT
description: A mactwist directly connected into a SAT maneuver with a fast and clean transition
minimum: Mactwist criteria, a more sideway exit of the mactwist is allowed, no spiral during the connection for max score, sat criteria.

criterias.twisted: twisted on the mactwist entry, untwisted by the rotation
criterias.full twisted: wisted on the mactwist entry, staying twisted during the whole rotation and connection, must stay twisted for min 1 turn in SAT. Can untwist for the SAT exit
criterias.devil twist: wisted on the mactwist entry, untwisted by the rotation and twisted again during the end of the rotation, staying twisted during the connection, must stay twisted for min 1 turn in SAT. Can untwist for the SAT exit
